displayName.english: This is where Q with VTubers begins!
displayName.japanese: ここからがVTuberのQの始まりだ！

description.english: Tutorial completed.
description.japanese: チュートリアルをクリアした

description.english: Unlocked a new stage for the first time.
description.japanese: 初めて新ステージをアンロックした

description.english: All questions implemented at the time of release completed.
description.japanese: リリース時の全ての問題をクリアした
description.schinese: 解开所有发售时的谜题
description.tchinese: 解開所有發售時的謎題

description.english: Total distance drawn in one stage reaches 1000m
description.japanese: 1つのステージで描いた距離の合計が1000mに到達
description.schinese: 在1道谜题中绘制的总距离达到1000m
description.tchinese: 在1道謎題中繪製的總距離達到1000m

description.english: You played Q with VTubers for the first time.
description.japanese: VTuberのQを始めた

description.english: 10 questions completed.
description.japanese: 問題を10問クリアした

description.english: 20 questions completed.
description.japanese: 問題を20問クリアした

description.english: 30 questions completed.
description.japanese: 問題を30問クリアした

description.english: You drew a line a distance about the height of the pyramids at Giza.
description.japanese: ギザのピラミッドの高さくらい描いた
description.schinese: 画了有吉萨金字塔那么高
description.tchinese: 畫了有吉薩金字塔那麽高

description.english: You drew a line a distance about the height of the world's tallest building.
description.japanese: 世界一高いビルの高さくらい描いた
description.schinese: 画了有世界第一高楼那么高
description.tchinese: 畫了有世界第一高樓那麽高

description.english: You drew a line a distance about the depth of the deepest lake in the world.
description.japanese: 世界一深い湖の深さくらい描いた
description.schinese: 画了有世界第一深湖那么深
description.tchinese: 畫了有世界第一深湖那麽深

description.english: You drew a line a distance about the height of the Mt Fuji.
description.japanese: 日本一高い山の高さくらい描いた
description.schinese: 画了有日本第一高山那么高
description.tchinese: 畫了有日本第一高山那麽高

description.english: You drew a line a distance about the height of the tallest building in the world.
description.japanese: 世界一高い山の高さくらい描いた
description.schinese: 画了有世界第一高山那么高
description.tchinese: 畫了有世界第一高山那麽高

description.english: You drew a line a distance about the depth of the world's deepest seabed.
description.japanese: 世界一深い海の底までぐらい描いた
description.schinese: 画了有世界第一深海那么深
description.tchinese: 畫了有世界第一深海那麽深

description.english: You drew a line a distance about the marathon.
description.japanese: マラソンの距離くらい描いた

description.english: You drew a line a distance about the height of the Northern Lights.
description.japanese: オーロラの高さくらい描いた

description.english: You drew a line a distance about the height of the space station.
description.japanese: 宇宙ステーションの高さくらい描いた

description.english: You drew a line a distance about the atmospheric height.
description.japanese: 大気圏の距離くらい描いた

description.english: You retried 99 times.
description.japanese: リトライ回数が99回を超えた

description.english: You retried 999 times.
description.japanese: リトライ回数が999回を超えた

description.english: You have completed all the questions in STAGE 01.
description.japanese: ステージ01を全てクリアした

description.english: You have completed all the questions in STAGE 02.
description.japanese: ステージ02を全てクリアした

description.english: You have completed all the questions in STAGE 03.
description.japanese: ステージ03を全てクリアした

description.english: All stages  implemented at the time of release unlocked.
description.japanese: リリース時の全てのステージをアンロックした
description.schinese: 解锁所有发售时的关卡
description.tchinese: 解鎖所有發售時的關卡

description.english: You've got 777 in line.
description.japanese: 777を揃えた

description.english: Shot down a UFO!
description.japanese: UFOを撃墜した

description.english: Witnessed all the towers.
description.japanese: 全てのタワーを目撃した

description.english: Alcohol spilled.
description.japanese: アルコールランプをこぼした

description.english: Knocked over a flowerpot.
description.japanese: 植木鉢を倒した

description.english: Identity of the Kaiju
description.japanese: 怪獣の正体を見た

description.english: Clicked the bad button.
description.japanese: バッドボタンを押した

description.english: Not a drop of tea was spilt.
description.japanese: 紅茶を一滴もこぼさなかった

description.english: The flag was put up on the other side.
description.japanese: 反対側に旗を刺した

description.english: No damage to the confessional.
description.japanese: 懺悔室防衛率100%

description.english: 40 questions completed.
description.japanese: 問題を40問クリアした

description.english: 50 questions completed.
description.japanese: 問題を50問クリアした

description.english: 60 questions completed.
description.japanese: 問題を60問クリアした

description.english: 70 questions completed.
description.japanese: 問題を70問クリアした

description.english: You have completed all the questions in STAGE 04.
description.japanese: ステージ04を全てクリアした

description.english: Cleared it using only one pellet.
description.japanese: 点１こだけでクリアした
description.schinese: 只用一个粒子就通关了。
description.tchinese: 只用一個粒子就通關了。

description.english: Put only the character in the box, no notes.
description.japanese: 音符は入れずキャラだけ入れた
description.schinese: 只把角色放进箱子里，没有放音符。
description.tchinese: 只把角色放進箱子裡，沒有放音符。

description.english: I wiped everyone out with what I drew.
description.japanese: 描いたもので人を全滅させてしまった
description.schinese: 我用自己画的东西把所有人都灭了。
description.tchinese: 我用自己畫的東西把所有人都滅了。

description.english: Chucked the salt jar into the pot.
description.japanese: 塩をビンごと鍋に放り込んだ

description.english: Nothing I drew was left on screen at clear.
description.japanese: クリア時に描いた物が画面内に無い状態
description.schinese: 通关时，我画的东西全没了。
description.tchinese: 通關時，我畫的東西全沒了。

description.english: Pushed my favorite all the way up to 300 meters!
description.japanese: 推しを300メートルまで推し上げた

description.english: Woke them up in one shot.
description.japanese: 一手で起こした

description.english: Turned all the light blue balls tiny.
description.japanese: 水色のボールを全て小さくした
description.schinese: 把所有浅蓝色的球都变小了。
description.tchinese: 把所有淺藍色的球都變小了。

description.english: Tried hitting the wall from left to right.
description.japanese: 左→右の順でカベに当ててみた
description.schinese: 按从左到右的顺序撞墙试了试。
description.tchinese: 按從左到右的順序撞牆試了試。

description.english: Put all objects into the “Yes” area.
description.japanese: 全てのオブジェクトを「はい」に入れてみた
description.schinese: 把所有物体都放进“是”区域了。
description.tchinese: 把所有物體都放進“是”區域了。

description.english: 80 questions completed.
description.japanese: 問題を80問クリアした

description.english: 90 questions completed.
description.japanese: 問題を90問クリアした

description.english: You have completed all the questions in STAGE 05.
description.japanese: ステージ05を全てクリアした

description.english: Clear without shrinking the blue ball.
description.japanese: 水色ボールを小さくせずクリアした

description.english: You made the desk sit on the chair.
description.japanese: 机を椅子に座らせた

description.english: You tried on various glasses.
description.japanese: 眼鏡を全て試着した

displayName.japanese: クロスプラットフォーム

description.english: You cleared it using an object that was not originally intended.
description.japanese: お互い逆のオブジェクトでクリアした
description.schinese: 你使用了本不该用的物体完成了关卡。
description.tchinese: 你使用了本不該用的物體完成了關卡。

description.english: You sent the hero off-screen and brought them back to show an even more incredible finishing move.
description.japanese: 上空から急降下してもっと凄い超必殺技をキメた
description.schinese: 你让英雄出画面一下，又回到画面展示了更酷的必杀技。
description.tchinese: 你讓英雄出畫面一下，又回到畫面展示了更酷的必殺技。

description.english: You tossed all the toys that belonged in the toy box off the screen.
description.japanese: おもちゃを全て画面外に捨ててしまいました
description.schinese: 你把所有应该放玩具箱的玩具都扔出画面了。
description.tchinese: 你把所有應該放玩具箱的玩具都扔出畫面了。

description.english: You only drew it once and safely put the Molacanthus in the tank. The Molacanthus is the larval form of the ocean sunfish (Mola mola).
description.japanese: 一回しか描かずにモラカンサス（マンボウの幼生）を安全に水槽に移した
description.schinese: 你只画了一次，然后把莫拉坎瑟斯安全地放进了水族箱。 莫拉坎瑟斯是翻车鱼的幼生。
description.tchinese: 你只畫了一次，然後把莫拉坎瑟斯安全地放進了水族箱。 莫拉坎瑟斯是翻車魚的幼生。

description.english: You succeeded in the high jump with only one attempt at drawing.
description.japanese: 一回しか描かずに高跳びを成功させました
description.schinese: 你只画了一次就成功跳高了。
description.tchinese: 你只畫了一次就成功跳高了。

description.english: You completed the level with a beaker holding at least four leaves.
description.japanese: ４枚以上ビーカーに入れた状態でクリア
description.schinese: 你用烧杯里有四片以上叶子的状态通关了。
description.tchinese: 你用燒杯裡有四片以上葉子的狀態通關了。

description.english: You made all the leaves fall.
description.japanese: 全ての葉っぱを散らせました
description.schinese: 你把所有叶子都弄掉了。
description.tchinese: 你把所有葉子都弄掉了。

description.english: 100 questions completed.
description.japanese: 問題を100問クリアした

description.english: 110 questions completed.
description.japanese: 問題を110問クリアした

description.english: You have completed all the questions in STAGE 06.
description.japanese: ステージ06を全てクリアした

description.english: Completed the character '漢' in a single stroke.
description.japanese: 一回しか描かずに漢の字を完成させた

description.english: Cleared all the seagulls off the screen in a single stroke.
description.japanese: 一回しか描かずに全てのカモメを画面外に出した
description.schinese: 一次就把所有海鸥移出屏幕
description.tchinese: 一次就把所有海鷗移出螢幕

description.english: Touched the dancer to the left wall in a single stroke.
description.japanese: 一回しか描かずにダンサーを左のカベに触れさせた
description.schinese: 一次就让舞者碰到左墙
description.tchinese: 一次就讓舞者碰到左牆

description.english: Ate beef tongue rare.
description.japanese: 牛タンをレアな焼き加減で食べた

description.english: Ate beef tongue medium.
description.japanese: 牛タンをミディアムな焼き加減で食べた

description.english: Ate beef tongue well done.
description.japanese: 牛タンをウェルダンな焼き加減で食べた

description.english: Ate beef tongue very well done.
description.japanese: 牛タンをベリーウェルダンな焼き加減で食べた

description.english: Sent the bad comment off-screen in a single stroke
description.japanese: 一回しか描かずにヤバいコメントを画面外へ追い出した
description.schinese: 一次就把不好的评论移出屏幕
description.tchinese: 一次就把不好的評論移出螢幕

description.english: Sent only the safe comments off-screen
description.japanese: 大丈夫なコメントだけ画面外へ追い出した
description.schinese: 只把正常的评论移出屏幕
description.tchinese: 只把正常的評論移出螢幕

description.english: Placed a 9
description.japanese: 「９」を入れました

description.english: Placed a ‘九’
description.japanese: 「九」を入れました

description.english: Placed a ‘Q’ in a different font
description.japanese: 違うフォントの「Q」を入れました

description.english: Sharpened the eyebrows in a single stroke
description.japanese: 一回しか描かずに眉毛をキリっとさせた
description.schinese: 一次就画出锐利的眉毛
description.tchinese: 一次就畫出銳利的眉毛

description.english: Scattered all the cherry blossoms
description.japanese: 桜を全て散らせた

description.english: Hit the wall with the cod roe
description.japanese: たらこを壁に当てた

description.english: Threw the cod roe off-screen
description.japanese: たらこを画面外に捨てた

description.english: Cleared without touching the cod roe even once
description.japanese: たらこに一回も触れずクリアした
description.schinese: 一次也没碰鳕鱼子就通关
description.tchinese: 一次也沒碰鱈魚子就通關

description.english: Shipped a pig instead of a person
description.japanese: 人ではなく豚を出荷した

description.english: Shipped an orange instead of a person
description.japanese: 人ではなくミカンを出荷した
description.schinese: 出货的是橘子，而不是人
description.tchinese: 出貨的是橘子，而不是人

description.english: Shipped a person in an orange box
description.japanese: 人をみかん箱で出荷した

description.english: Shipped a pig in an orange box
description.japanese: 豚をみかん箱で出荷した

description.english: Defeated the monster with a One-handed Sword
description.japanese: 片手剣で怪獣を討伐した

description.english: Defeated the monster with a Great Sword
description.japanese: 大剣で怪獣を討伐した

description.english: Stood properly on the mountain summit
description.japanese: 山の頂に足でちゃんと立った

description.english: Made the cat stream
description.japanese: 猫に配信をさせた

description.english: Stopped the truck with a single stroke
description.japanese: 一回しか描かずにトラックを停止させた
